topic.title: Multi-Output PDU Option: Changing Output Voltage

body.p: The transformer of a PDU with the Multi-Output PDU Option can be reconfigured in the field for any one of two or three voltages at 60 Hz, depending on the option chosen. The transformer neutral bus bar must be relocated and changes must be made to PDU and monitoring parameters, including alarms limits. Transformer output reconfiguration should be performed by an Eaton Service Representative or an Eaton-authorized service technician.
Contact Eaton Service to schedule transformer voltage reconfiguration (see ). Multi-Output PDU Option, 2-Voltage Output
